Interface DatabaseService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AppContextCleanup, AppContextService<DatabaseService>, Contexed
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultDataBaseService, JNDIDatabaseService

    public interface DatabaseService
extends Contexed, AppContextService<DatabaseService>
    A service that supplies the DataBase Connection

    spb

        SQLContext getSQLContext(java.lang.String tag)

      • inTransaction

        boolean inTransaction()
        Are we already in a transaction
        Returns:

      • startTransaction

        void startTransaction()
        Start a database transaction Transactions cannot be nested to use inTransaction() if possible doubt.

      • rollbackTransaction

        void rollbackTransaction()
        Abort changes since start or last commit

      • commitTransaction

        void commitTransaction()
        flush changes since start of last commit. Unlike the commit method of a Connection this is a NOP if not in a transaction.

      • stopTransaction

        void stopTransaction()
        finish transaction (includes commit).
